info.name: Reloadly API
info.description:
## About Reloadly

Reloadly's APIs facilitates connections to mobile credits, digital gift cards and fintech services to end users. You can learn more by checking out our [API documentation](https://developers.reloadly.com)

item.name: Airtime API
Production
item.description: This folder contains all the endpoints to be used when working with live applications.

item.name: Sandbox
item.description: This folder contains all the endpoints to be used when working in test mode and simulating real-like scenarios.

The Airtime API collection contains Reloadly's Airtime API endpoints. With this, you can view details of operators, countries, discounts, and promotions. You can also make top-ups and asynchronous top-ups as well.

item.name: GiftCard API
Production
item.description: This folder contains all the endpoints to be used when working with live applications.

item.name: Sandbox
Redeem Instructions By Brand ID - Sandbox

item.description: This folder contains all the endpoints to be used when working in test mode and simulating real-like scenarios.
GiftCard API: This collection contains Reloadly's GiftCard API endpoints. With this, you can have access to gift card products, brands, discounts, redeem instructions and ordering of a gift card.

item.name: Number Lookup API
Production
item.description: This folder contains all the endpoints to be used when working with live applications.

item.name: Sandbox
item.description: This folder contains all the endpoints to be used when working in test mode and simulating real-like scenarios.

Number Lookup API: This collection has endpoints for Reloadly's Number Lookup API. With this, you can view the operator details of any number - especially when it has been ported to a different operator.

item.name: Utility Payments API

query.description: The biller ID. Uniquely identifies the biller servicing the utility.
This indicates the utility biller's name. In situations where the biller's name is exceptionally long, partial names are allowed.
This indicates the type of utility payment handled by the biller. Following values are allowed: ELECTRICITY_BILL_PAYMENT, WATER_BILL_PAYMENT, TV_BILL_PAYMENT and INTERNET_BILL_PAYMENT.
This indicates the payment service type being rendered by the utility biller service. Examples are PREPAID  and  POSTPAID.
This indicates the ISO code of the country where the utility biller is operating in.
This specifies the number of pages to be retrieved.
This specifies the number of billers to be retrieved per page.
The reference ID you may have specified while placing the transaction.
The page to be retrieved from the transaction list.
Number of items to include in a single page.
The start time to be used for the search. Format is YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss
The end time to be used for the search. Format is YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss
The transaction's status. Can be one of the following: PROCESSING, SUCCESSFUL, FAILED or REFUNDED.
The biller's service type. Can be either PREPAID or POSTPAID .
The biller's type. Can be one of the following: ELECTRICITY_BILL_PAYMENT, WATER_BILL_PAYMENT, TV_BILL_PAYMENT, INTERNET_BILL_PAYMENT
The country code of the biller
The biller ID. Uniquely identifies the biller servicing the utility.
This indicates the utility biller's name. In situations where the biller's name is exceptionally long, partial names are allowed.
This indicates the type of utility payment handled by the biller. Following values are allowed: ELECTRICITY_BILL_PAYMENT, WATER_BILL_PAYMENT, TV_BILL_PAYMENT and INTERNET_BILL_PAYMENT.
This indicates the payment service type being rendered by the utility biller service. Examples are PREPAID  and  POSTPAID.

Number of items to include in a single page.
The start time to be used for the search. Format is YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss
The end time to be used for the search. Format is YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss
The transaction's status. Can be one of the following: PROCESSING, SUCCESSFUL, FAILED or REFUNDED.
The biller's service type. Can be either PREPAID or POSTPAID .
The biller's type. Can be one of the following: ELECTRICITY_BILL_PAYMENT, WATER_BILL_PAYMENT, TV_BILL_PAYMENT, INTERNET_BILL_PAYMENT

item.description: The Utility Payments API collection contains Reloadly's utility payment API endpoints. Using this, you can view details of utility billers that provide services such as electricity, water, and internet. You can also make a utility bill payment and view your transaction data.
